name: Portfolio
description: 1. npm init -y 2. npm i -D tailwindcss 3. Install tailwindcss intellisense vs code plugin 4. npx tailwindcss init 5. create two folder with the name "src" and "output". 6. create src/style.css file 7. into the style.css file write the following code 	-@tailwind base; 	-@tailwind components; 	-@tailwind utilities; 8. create .vscode/settings.json file 9. in settings.json file write the following code 	{ 		"css.validate": false, 		"tailwindCSS.emmetCompletions": true 	} 10. in package.json file write the following code into the scripts 	-"build" : "tailwindcss -i ./src/input.css -o ./dist/output.css --watch" 11. add the compiled css file to the head 	<link href="/dist/output.css" rel="stylesheet"> 12. npm run build
